sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import styles from './Contact.module.css' import { selectDarkModeState, selectDarkModeInit } from '../darkmode/darkModeSlice' import { useAppSelector } from '../../app/hooks' const Contact = () => { const darkmode = useAppSelector(selectDarkModeState) const darkmodeInit = useAppSelector(selectDarkModeInit) return (
